Purpose: Sequencing and interpretation of genes associated with inherited ataxias for diagnostic use.
Equipment: DNA extraction kit, spectrophotometer (e.g., Nanodrop), gel electrophoresis apparatus, Qubit fluorometer, Bioanalyzer, sequencing platform (e.g., Illumina or Ion Torrent), bioinformatics software (e.g., BWA, GATK, DeepVariant)
